summary:
Ishmael was Abraham's first son in the Bible. His mother, Hagar, was Sarah's servant. Ishmael lived to be 137 years old. Many believe he is the ancestor of the Arab people.

In Islam, Ishmael is considered a prophet and the forefather of the Ishmaelites, also known as the Hagarenes or Adnanites. He is seen as the patriarch of QaydƒÅr.
title: Ishmael
